sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { IonIcon } from '@ionic/react'; import { checkmarkCircleOutline } from 'ionicons/icons'; import { FaAmbulance, FaHospital, FaMobileAlt, FaRobot, FaVideo } from "react-icons/fa"; import './Home.css'; function Home() { return (

CONNECTING RURAL INDIA TO MODERN HEALTHCARE, ENSURING NO ONE IS LEFT BEHIND.

MEDICONNECT

About Us

INCORPORATING AI WITH HEALTHCARE

MEDICONNECT USES AI TO TACKLE THE PROBLEMS RAISED BY RURAL MEDICAL INFRASTRUCTURE

  • TIMELY DIAGNOSIS
  • MEDICINES DELIVERED TO HOME
  • EXPERT HEALTHCARE IN REMOTE AREAS
  • EMERGENCY SERVICES

SERVICES

Medi Connect is an AI-powered telemedicine kiosk designed to provide affordable healthcare solutions to rural India. By leveraging cutting-edge technology, we aim to bridge the healthcare gap and ensure medical services are available to everyone, no matter their location.

Mobile-Based Access

Access healthcare services directly from your mobile phone using simple OTP authentication.

AI-Powered Chatbot

Our AI chatbot guides patients through the process and provides recommendations based on symptoms.

Remote Consultations

Video conferencing allows patients to consult with specialists from their local kiosk or home.

Access to Specialists

Get referred to specialists and receive treatment plans through a simple and efficient process.

Youtube Video Recommendations

Learn more about telemedicine and its benefits through this introductory video.

Ambulance Services

Ambulance services can be provided to the patients.

); } export default Home;
